item.name: Classic McLaren Wines
item.address1: Lot B, Coppermine Road, McLaren Vale, SA 5171
item.description: Classic McLaren Wines is a substantial business, with 57ha of vineyards planted to shiraz, merlot, cabernet sauvignon, semillon and chardonnay, and has built a winery and underground cellar. In September 2007 it was purchased by Sarah and Sparky Marquis of Mollydooker fame. Exports to the UK, the US and other major markets.
